thread.title: Kim Kardashian works out with Kourtney on Snapchat | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian works out with Kourtney on Snapchat | Daily Mail Online

author: Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.Com
title: Kim Kardashian works out with Kourtney on Snapchat | Daily Mail Online
text: She enjoyed an early morning workout with her sister Kourtney . But it seems like Kim Kardashian was busy balancing on more than just the fitness ball. The 36-year-old reality star was quite active on social media as she not only documented her gym trip but also plugged several of her products on Monday. Scroll down for video Balancing act: Kim Kardashian took to Snapchat to share a few photos of she and sister Kourtney working out Inaugural title: The 36-year-old reality star announced the first book of her book club with Chrissy Teigen and Jen Atkin which was Embraced By The Light by Betty J. Eadie Perhaps the most interesting was the announcement of the first book of her book club with Chrissy Teigen and Jen Atkin which she announced on her subscriber-based website KimKardashianWest.com . The first addition to the club was Embraced By The Light by Betty J. Eadie. Kim explained that she chose this book as her late father Robert Kardashian tried to get her to read it throughout high school but she was 'too busy' to do it until he passed away. She explained it helped her cope with the death of her father. Huge boost: Just over a week ago, Kim posted about meeting her 'favorite author' Wisdom: While it might appear that Kim has everything in life one could want, the wealthy, famous, beautiful star said she gleaned huge lessons from the 25-year-old book Huge plug: Writer Betty J. Eadie's work was exposed to a huge audience with Kim's endorsement She has since picked it up several times as she wrote on her blog: 'I read it again after having kids and after the life experiences that I've had more recently and now the book means something different to me. 'It just gives me tools on how to live a better life here and live life to its potential and just be more spiritual and one with God.' No doubt Kim is a big fan of the novel as she tweeted about meeting with her 'favorite' author Eadie just over a week ago. Selfie reflection: She plugged the new Lumee Duo iPhone case on Instagram as she is a partner with the company New avatar, who dis? It didn't stop there as she also promoted her highly-popular Kim Kardashian Game app on Twitter She was not done plugging her projects as she shared a photo of herself tapping around on her mobile phone to promote the Lumee Duo iPhone case. The wife of Kanye West has been a longtime partner with the light-up case and has even collabed with them for a few designs. It didn't stop there as she also promoted her highly-popular Kim Kardashian Game app on Twitter. Back-to-back: Kim documented her workout with 37-year-old sister Kourtney In motion: The two also did stability ball exercises Ab-solutely fabulous: They also did ab work with medicine balls Tossing it up: It certainly seemed to be a challenging workout One step at a time: She shared a snap of herself on the Stairmaster Partners in crime: Kourtney shared a snap of Kim as she praised her by saying she was the 'best workout partner' She shared a photo of her avatar wearing a tight beige dress and a black dad cap which she captioned: 'HI!!!! @KKHOfficial.' As if her day wasn't busy enough, she documented her entire workout routine with 37-year-old sister Kourtney Kardashian on Snapchat. The two did some impressive training including squats with a fitness ball in between them, stability ball exercises and ab work with medicine balls. Lap of luxury: She also shared an unpolished snap of herself by a pond in a backyard while wearing a chic white Chanel robe Kim also documented her walk on the stairmaster in addition to lateral squats with a resistance band on a treadmill. As if that wasn't already enough posting across her social networks, she also shared an unpolished snap of herself by a pond in a backyard while wearing a chic white Chanel robe. Pucker up: It wouldn't be a day on social media for Kim Kardashian without sharing a selfie Aww: She also posed with Kourtney's daughter Penelope Aww: The four-year-old had fun with the bunny rabbit filter Share or comment on this article 150
